dialog_1.subtitle_1: Your body fat percentage and body category are calculated with the gender, height, neck size, waist size and hip size you enter.
Your BMR and calorie needs are calculated with the fat percentage and body weight you enter.
Your 1 to 10 repetitions calculated with the weight you and repetition you enter.

It shows how you can load the weight you entered with your equipment. You can click on select equipment to select your equipment. You can also browse alternative loadings with the arrow buttons and the variant selection window.

edit_profile.error_content_2: Check your internet connection! Do not forget that, picture size must be less than 1mb.

appearance.title: Appearance
appearance.subtitle: Change the in-app theme to light or dark, or use the phone's default settings.

dialog_1.title: Are you sure you want to leave?
dialog_1.content: If you leave now, your attempt will finish and you will lose your progress.

paywall.title: Lightweight Calculator Pro
paywall.content_1: Hit your desired max with our smart calculation!
paywall.content_2: If you are on the mood, hit even bigger max!
paywall.content_3: Lift your attempts when you are fully ready!
paywall.content_4: Do not worry about the plate math, we will handle!

tutorial.content_1: Enter your desired max and equipment availability. We will keep your equipments for future PR attempts, you can change them anytime.
tutorial.content_2: Start warming up with suggested weights. We will prepare you up to your max.
tutorial.content_3: Follow rest intervals when you are done with your set. Cutting rest intervals short or letting loose might affect your performance.
tutorial.content_4: Getting close to the max, we will ask you how you feel on your attempts. Those answers will get you the optimum total.

result.article_1: Congratulations! You hit your goal in this attempt selection. Now it's time to work on improving your lift even further, we will remind you when it's time to get PR!
result.article_2: You did not reach your goal in this attempt selection, but you still did a good job. Now it's time to work on increasing your Lightweight leve, we will remind you when it's time to get PR!

dialog_1.subtitle_1: With the weight you entered and the repetition you selected, your one rep maximum is calculated first.
dialog_1.subtitle_3: is used in this calculation. Then your wilks score is calculated with your body weight and your one rep max.
dialog_1.subtitle_6:
In order to be on the leaderboard, you must enter the video link of your lift. By entering the video link, you are agreeing to be on the leaderboard. If the video in the link is deleted or changed, you will be removed from the leaderboard. For validate your lift, the video must comply with these rules:

1-When redirected to the video, the video of the upload must be entered directly.
2-The video and the entered lift must match.
3-Only the uploaded video must be found in the video.
4-The video must be permanent on the platform where it is uploaded.
5-The weight used must be countable.
6-The athlete performing the lift should not harm himself during the lift due to reasons such as poor form.

If one or more of these rules are not met, the lift will be rejected.

dialog_2.title: Verified
dialog_2.content: Your lift has been verified by our team.

dialog_3.title: Unverified
dialog_3.content: If you have added lift video and it is public, it will be checked by our team as soon as possible.

dialog_4.title: Rejected
dialog_4.content: Your lift was rejected. Your video could not be accessed externally or the lift information did not match the video.

dialog_5.title: Are you sure you want to delete lift?

dialog_6.title: Are you sure you want to update lift?
dialog_6.content: If you update the lift you will lose the verification and wait a while until it is verified again.

lift_card.content_1: Here is my lift. Let's race!
lift_card.content_2: You can watch from this link

lightweight_card.content_1: Here is my Lightweight Card. Let's race!
lightweight_card.warning_1: You must have at least three lifts in different exercises to get the Lightweight Card.
lightweight_card.warning_2: You must have at least three valid lifts in three different exercises to get the Golden Lightweight Card.

dialog_1.content_1:
The bars show the Lightweight score out of 100 for that exercise. The grids that appear when clicked show the Lightweight levels.
Heavy Lightweight Levels:

dialog_2.content_1: The bars show the difference from the average for that exercise. It shows how many people are when clicked.

activity_level.name_5: Extra Active(very intense exercise daily, or physical job)

classification.description_1: According to your lift, you've never trained strength regularly. Majority of the population is in this category. Ask yourself in front of a mirror: "do you even lift?".
classification.description_2: Your lift is novice. Lifter in this category is stronger than untrained individuals. At least a few months of training is required to get to that level.
classification.description_3: Your lift is intermediate. Probably, you've been training for at least a year. The majority of those who go to the gym regularly fall into this category.
classification.description_4: It looks like you've made a lot of gains so far! Probably you've been lifting for more than two years. You are much stronger than average gym rat.
classification.description_5: Congratulations, your lift is advanced. It seems like you've been lifting for years. You may be the strongest in your gym, should consider competing.
classification.description_6: Exceptional lift! For many lifters, this level is near the maximum genetic potential without the use of performance-enhancing drugs. You should consider competing seriously.
classification.description_7: Congratulations, your lift is elite! This level requires lifetime consistency in training and diet. A few people can be able to reach that level nationally.
classification.description_8: Extraordinary, this lift will make a worldwide impact! This level requires both exceptional talent and rigorous effort. You are one of the best of the best!

report.name_1: Video and lift do not match
report.name_3: Video is not persistent on uploaded platform
report.name_4: The weights used are not countable

lifter_tag.description_1: No one can beat you when it comes to squatting! You are the star of this exercise.
lifter_tag.description_2: You are a pressing machine! You should participate in competitions where using hydraulics is not a cheat.
lifter_tag.description_3: You are a master at lifting weights from the ground! I hope the plates in the gym are enough for you.
lifter_tag.description_4: You are a pulling machine. Your back muscles are like a stone.
lifter_tag.description_5: You are the king of the streets! Gym, park, it doesn't matter. When you hold onto the iron, all eyes are on you.
